tab1.text1:
Welcome to noFear PvP NoWipe Cluster

https://nofear.tebex.io/ Button @ Bottom left of this page
http://discord.gg/JarwSJKKvZ Button @ Bottom left of this page

PvP maps (NoWipe) : TheIsland and all future map additions coming in later.

Cross Server cluster chat is enabled. Full global chat history in Discord (Once API is developped for plugins.

You can scroll these panels.
Buttons for each different sections in the corners

Important Notes:
You can use the obelisk or drop beacons to transfer between maps with your survivor (levels & engrams), items and dinos (Once more maps are added to the cluster).

Keep in mind that this server is hosted and there is a cost for it. All support/donations goes directly to the server management and hardware upgrades of enegy bills so those are greatly welcome.

 Server admin : ZaRd
